title: [Self-Directed] Intergenerational Climate Change Education Design Workshop: Research-Based Learning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of climate change and foundational knowledge of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented instructional design programs for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Participants can develop climate change education design plans using Research-Based Learning methodologies.
Participants can improve intergenerational learning programs by applying the four stages of Design-Based Research (design-implementation-evaluation-revision).
Participants can evaluate the effectiveness of instructional design using quantitative/qualitative data analysis tools and prepare a report.

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
